summary:
Wrath & Glory is a tabletop role-playing game set in the Warhammer 40k universe, specifically in the grim darkness of the Orks' own sector known as the "WAAAGH!" sector. The game focuses on the Orks and their struggle against various foes, including other factions within the sector and external threats from beyond.

Key rules and mechanics include a straightforward dice-based combat system, skill checks, and narrative-driven storytelling. Players create and customize their own Ork characters, selecting from a variety of races, careers, and equipment to suit their desired playstyle. The game also features a robust campaign system, allowing players to shape the sector through their actions and decisions.

Important NPCs include prominent Orks such as the warboss, who leads the WAAAGH! sector, as well as other notable characters like the shaman, who provides spiritual guidance and support to the Orks. Factions within the sector include other Ork clans, as well as rival factions like the Eldar and Dark Eldar, who present a constant threat to the Orks' dominance. Notable locations include the bustling Ork capital of Mork's Maw, as well as dangerous ruins and caverns that hold secrets and treasures.

Campaign-relevant information includes the ongoing conflict between the Orks and their foes, as well as the threat of external threats like Chaos Space Marines and Tyranid hive fleets. Players can expect to encounter a variety of challenges and obstacles throughout the campaign, including battles against these foes, as well as internal conflicts within the Ork clans themselves.
